field.name: summary
field.value: Updated binaries to NHibernate trunk revision 3694

field.name: description
field.value: Apply this patch to update binaries to NHibernate trunk revision 3694. This patch add some method to Facilities/ActiveRecordIntegration/Castle.Facilities.ActiveRecordIntegration/SafeSessionProxy.cs and Facilities/NHibernateIntegration/Castle.Facilities.NHibernateIntegration/Internal/SessionDelegate.cs to properly implements the ISession extended interface.

comment.author: Melato
comment.text: Remember to copy the assembles NHibernate.dll and Iesi.Collections.dll to the SharedLib folder.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: Thanks for your patch. Since NHibernate has moved on quite a bit since your patch I didn't apply it but the castle trunk is now running on the NHibernate trunk.
